message.name: LOG_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERY_RECORDS_SELECTED
message.locale: Number of records selected for processing: %1n.

message.name: LOG_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERY_UNABLE_TO_NOTIFY_SKIP
message.locale: Notification not created for skipped record as no caseid associated with milestonedeliveryid %1n.

message.name: LOG_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERY_SKIP_NOTIFICATION_OFF
message.locale: No notification for will be created for the skipped milestonedeliveryid %1n as notification property %2s is turned off.

message.name: INF_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERYENDDATEBATCH_FAILURE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Scan Milestone Delivery End Date Batch for milestone '%1s' did not complete successfully.

message.name: INF_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERYENDDATEBATCH_REPORT_SUBJECT
message.locale: Report from Scan Milestone Delivery End Date batch job run at %1s on %2s.

message.name: INF_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERYSTARTDATEBATCH_FAILURE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Scan Milestone Delivery Start Date Batch for milestone '%1s' did not complete successfully.

message.name: INF_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERYSTARTDATEBATCH_REPORT_SUBJECT
message.locale: Report from Scan Milestone Delivery Start Date batch job run at %1s on %2s.

message.name: INF_SCANMILESTONEDELIVERYBATCH_REPORT_TOTAL_RECORDS
message.locale: Total number of milestonedelivery records processed: %1n
